Description.Name: Basic Attack
Basic Attack: Ignited Status
Dodge
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Performs a shoulder charge attack forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter
Special Attack
Special Attack: Ignite
EX Special Attack
Chain Attack
Ultimate
Quick Assist
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slash and punch enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist
Assist Follow-Up

Name: Core Passive:
Additional Ability:
Desc:
When there is an <color=#FFFFFF>[Assist]</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>[Stun]</color> character in the squad:
When Komano Manato uses Ultimate, gain 8 stacks of [Vitality], when using Chain Attack, gain 4 stacks of [Vitality], lasting 60 seconds, stacking up to 16 times, repeated triggers reset the duration; When Komano Manato performs consecutive slashes with <color=#FFFFFF>[Basic Attack: Enhance]</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>[Offensive Assist]</color>, if maximum HP is below 50%, consume 1 stack of [Vitality] to restore 2% of maximum HP.

1.Name: PlaceHolder
1.Desc: For every 1% of HP lost, Komano Manato's <color=#FFFFFF>[Offensive Assist]</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>[Basic Attack]</color> deal 0.4% more Fire DMG, up to a maximum increase of 20%.

2.Name: PlaceHolder
2.Desc: When ignited, Komano Manato ignores 8% of target's <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color>; After being attacked by enemies during <color=#FFFFFF>[Special Attack]</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>[Offensive Assist]</color>.

4.Name: PlaceHolder
4.Desc: Max HP increased by 10%; during <color=#FFFFFF>[Special Attack]</color>, Komano Manato won't die and HP will only drop to 1 at minimum.

6.Name: PlaceHolder
6.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>[Special Attack]</color>When hitting a Stunned enemy, Komano Manato recovers 75 [Fire] points and gains 8 stacks of [Vitality]. Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>[Offensive Assist]</color>. The [Vitality] effect can trigger once every 20 seconds. When <color=#FFFFFF>[Assist Follow-Up]</color> hits an enemy, Fire DMG is increased by 4% for 8 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Repeated triggers refresh the duration.
